00011     class syncedlinear
00012     {
00013     protected:
00014         value_type prev;
00015         value_type curr;
00016 
00017     public:
00018         value_type value;
00019 
00020         syncedlinear() {}
00021 
00022         syncedlinear(const value_type& t) {
00023             prev = curr = t;
00024         }
00025 
00026         syncedlinear& operator =(const value_type& t) {
00027             prev = curr = t;
00028             return *this;
00029         }
00030 
00031         void extend(const value_type& t)
00032                 {
00033             prev = curr;
00034             curr += t;
00035         }
00036         
00037         inline void clamp(const value_type& low, const value_type& high) {
00038             curr = (curr < low ? low : (curr > high ? high : curr));
00039         }
00040 
00041         inline void smooth(float alpha) {
00042             value = prev + (curr - prev) * alpha;
00043         }

00065     template <typename value_type>
00066     class linear
00067     {
00068     public:
00069         inline static value_type y(const value_type& x) {
00070             return x;
00071         }
00072     };
00073 
00077     template <typename value_type, int n, typename poly = linear<value_type> >
00078     class syncedanimator
00079     {
00080     protected:
00081         value_type subdivision[n];
00082         int prev, curr;
00083 
00084     public:
00085         value_type value;
00086         char direction;
00087         bool continous;
00088 
00089         syncedanimator()
00090                 {
00091             prev = curr = 0;
00092             direction = 1;
00093             continous = false;
00094         }
00095 
00096         syncedanimator& operator =(int i)
00097                 {
00098             prev = curr = i;
00099             value = subdivision[i];
00100             return *this;
00101         }
00102 
00103         void set(const value_type& low, const value_type& high)
00104                 {
00105             subdivision[0] = low;
00106             subdivision[n - 1] = high;
00107 
00108             for( int i = 1; i < n - 1; ++i )
00109             {
00110                 subdivision[i] =
00111                     poly::y(((float)i / (float)(n - 1)));
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00115         void step()
00116                 {
00117             prev = curr;
00118 
00119             if( continous )
00120             {
00121                 curr = (curr + direction) % n;
00122 
00123                 if( prev > curr )
00124                 {
00125                     prev = curr;
00126                     ++curr;
00127                 }
00128             }
00129             else
00130                 curr = min(max(0, curr + direction), n - 1);
00131 
00132             value = subdivision[curr];
00133         }
00134 
00135         inline void smooth(float alpha) {
00136             value = subdivision[prev] + (subdivision[curr] - subdivision[prev]) * alpha;
00137         }
00138 
00139         inline int count() const {
00140             return n;
00141         }
00142 
00143         inline int current() const {
00144             return curr;
00145         }
00146 
00147         inline int previous() const {
00148             return prev;
00149         }
00150 
00151                 inline int& current() {
00152             return curr;
00153         }
00154 
00155         inline int& previous() {
00156             return prev;
00157         }
00158 
00159                 inline const value_type& low() const {
00160                         return subdivision[0];
00161                 }
00162 
00163                 inline const value_type& high() const {
00164                         return subdivision[n - 1];
00165                 }
00166     };
